title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 3 points:

1 point: For x = e

1 point: For the relative maximum

1 point: For the justification

f'(x) = 0 when x = e. The function f has a relative maximum at x = e because f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = e.
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

1 point: For x = e

1 point: For the relative maximum

1 point: For the justification

f'(x) = 0 when x = e. The function f has a relative maximum at x = e because f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = e.

The response earns one of the following points:

1 point: For x = e

1 point: For the relative maximum

1 point: For the justification

f'(x) = 0 when x = e. The function f has a relative maximum at x = e because f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = e.

The response earns two of the following points:

1 point: For x = e

1 point: For the relative maximum

1 point: For the justification

f'(x) = 0 when x = e. The function f has a relative maximum at x = e because f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = e.

The response earns all three of the following points:

1 point: For x = e

1 point: For the relative maximum

1 point: For the justification

f'(x) = 0 when x = e. The function f has a relative maximum at x = e because f'(x) changes from positive to negative at x = e.
